metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10021 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description:
** DISPUTED ** drivers/scsi/libsas/sas_scsi_host.c in the Linux kernelbefore 4.16 allows local users to cause a denial of service (ata qc leak)by triggering certain failure conditions. NOTE: a third party disputes therelevance of this report because the failure can only occur for physicallyproximate attackers who unplug SAS Host Bus Adapter cables.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-23.25
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1012-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1012.13
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1159-aws - 4.15.0-1010.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1013-azure - 4.15.0-1013.13
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1009-gcp - 4.15.0-1009.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1143-kvm - 4.15.0-1011.11
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1008-oem - 4.15.0-1008.11
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-23.25').
linux-raspi2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1012.13').
linux-aws package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1010.10').
linux-azure package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1013.13').
linux-gcp package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1009.9').
linux-kvm package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1011.11').
linux-oem package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1008.11').
